name: @fynks/debrid-service-comparison
description: A concise comparison of pricing and supported hosts for popular debrid services including AllDebrid, Real-Debrid, LinkSnappy, Premiumize, Debrid-Link, TorBox, and Mega-Debrid.

scripts.optimize-json: chmod +x scripts/json-optimizer.sh && scripts/json-optimizer.sh dist/json/file-hosts.json dist/json/file-hosts-optimized.json && scripts/json-optimizer.sh dist/json/adult-hosts.json dist/json/adult-hosts-optimized.json
scripts.build: npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js && npm run optimize-json && workbox generateSW workbox-config.js

author: fynks
